Developer Terms of Use
des:
Speak2 Family uses an Amazon Echo to enable more convenient communications between your friends & family. By enabling this skill and linking your Speak2Family.com account, you can easily send messages using the Speak2 Family app and an Amazon Echo device. 

Please note that you need a Speak2Family account to use this skill. Instructions for setting up an account can be found at Speak2Family.com. You will be signing up for yourself and for at least one additional person who will receive your messages. 

Open the skill by saying "Alexa, open Speak2", or "Alexa, tell Speak2 to play my messages." Use the Speak2 Family app to text a message or record your voice! You must have a Speak2Family.com account with a Message Recipient for this skill to work properly.

A great feature is the ability to reply to messages using Alexa. You can turn "message replies" on and off by saying; "Alexa, tell speak2 to turn on message replies." or "Alexa, tell speak2 to turn off message replies." Message Replies are "off" by default, but you can control turning them on or off through your Alexa or in your Speak2Family.com account.
